Name: Justice Lance- Lance
Description: Close-range weapon, the spear strikes like a dragon, accumulating battle intent with each attack, forming an indestructible shield around the warrior for solid defense. As the power reaches its peak, the warrior can throw the spear farther, releasing a devastating strike like a meteor streaking across the night sky.
